step.cmd: Found on the bottom left side of the window under the “+Section” button of the OneNote app
If you don’t see this button, go to “Show Notebooks” on the Navigation bar
When the new section appears, create a new title for the section
Press enter to finalize your section title
Now that the section is created, you can begin creating content by placing your cursor onto the page
You can then rearrange the order of your sections by selecting the titles and moving them
